name: The Golden Vine Combo Pack
description:
This includes both the Onward We March T-shirt as well as the debut album, The Golden Vine.  Save $2 by ordering this combo pack!!!

PLEASE NOTE...All orders placed after 5 pm will be filled the next day.  If you would like to pick up your order at one of our shows please put "show pickup" anywhere in the address field when ordering and you will be reimbursed the shipping costs when you pick up your order.

name: Onward We March T-Shirt
description:
Gildan Heavy 100% Pre-shrunk Cotton.  Sizes small through extra-large are available.  Black with Golden Yellow OWM logos on front and back.


PLEASE NOTE...All orders placed after 5 pm will be filled the next day.  If you would like to pick up your order at one of our shows please put "show pickup" anywhere in the address field when ordering and you will be reimbursed the shipping costs when you pick up your order.

name: The Golden Vine
description:
Track 1. Into The Hollow
Track 2. Wolves Of Despair
Track 3. Of Pestilence
Track 4. People Of Wood
Track 5. Onward We March
Track 6. The Human Aberration
Track 7. The Golden Vine


PLEASE NOTE...All orders placed after 5 pm will be filled the next day.  If you would like to pick up your order at one of our shows please put "show pickup" anywhere in the address field when ordering and you will be reimbursed the shipping costs when you pick up your order.
